thread.title: Tamara M Lucas
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Tamara M Lucas

author: Tamara M Lucas
title: Tamara M Lucas
text: The only problem I have was getting bigger size bed, I really wanted the full size bed. Queen a little bigger then I wanted but still love it. The driver was alright. They could of help me a little more. But other then that I am happy with the service.
